content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The goal of AXS Academy is to foresee AXS needs in particular engineers and train fresh talents with proper skills, so when demand comes people are prepared and know AXS context and technology stack.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The academy has multiple phases, which in total take about 3 months, with the goal to have fully trained, high efficient engineers who can jump to production activities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Phase 1: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TA team together with EPAM leads carefully select candidates doing multiple pre-screening and interview sessions. Multiple criteria are taken into account: including speaking/writing English, hard and soft skills.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Phase 2: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Selected talents take part in multiple internal trainings and tech talks aiming to strengthen soft and hard skills with focus on AXS specifics.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Phase 3: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The talents are enrolled in real AXS projects and work under supervision of EPAM tech lead working at AXS, contributing to projects success and gaining real experience. By the end of this phase people are ready to work as independent engineers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{\"size\":361690,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0c65627b-b564-4b14-8119-fa737e6b3a00/Slide10.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0c65627b-b564-4b14-8119-fa737e6b3a00/Slide10.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Slide10.PNG\",\"name\":\"Slide10.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0c65627b-b564-4b14-8119-fa737e6b3a00\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055.02783203125,\"height\":593.4531555175781},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AXS Academy Talent Journey\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":122119,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ba2221ee-b791-407c-bbf8-f81a5bc8e23c/AXSJourney.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ba2221ee-b791-407c-bbf8-f81a5bc8e23c/AXSJourney.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"AXSJourney.JPG\",\"name\":\"AXSJourney.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ba2221ee-b791-407c-bbf8-f81a5bc8e23c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055.02783203125,\"height\":543.3130016866421},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DOWNLOAD Academy Talent Journey.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c171d908-2349-4768-9b33-1def2bdcc0e0/AXS Academy Talent Journey.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"AXS Academy Talent Journey.PNG\",\"name\":\"AXS Academy Talent Journey.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c171d908-2349-4768-9b33-1def2bdcc0e0\",\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Participants AXS Academy may be visible to the customer or not. In the first case, the customer knows about them and they can communicate with the customer. In the second case, they are trained using only internal resources and the customer does not know about their involvement in the project. Also, participants of AXS Academy do not fill Weekly report.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
